Actions.Text: REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Establishes expanded construction mentorship opportunities for small and minority and women-owned business enterprises
Summary: Establishes expanded construction mentorship opportunities for small and minority and women-owned business enterprises.
LawCode: Amd §§311 & 313, Exec L; amd §147, St Fin L; amd §1265-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the state finance law and the public authorities law, in relation to establishing expanded construction mentorship opportunities for small and minority and women-owned business enterprises
